alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 1:08PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...POTENT WINTER STORM CONTINUES... .A strong winter storm will continue to impact the region through tonight. Additional snow amounts will generally be highest across the northern Black Hills area, and southwest through south central South Dakota. Strong northwest winds gusting 35 to 50 mph at times on the South Dakota plains will continue to support blizzard or near blizzard conditions at times. Listen to NOAA Weather Radio or your local media for the latest updates on this storm. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Southern Foot Hills, the Custer County Plains, the Fall River County Plains and the Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Foot Hills
